      First 2 bytes of a GZIP file have this signature.

      Fields in org.neo4j.csv.reader with type parameters of type Magic

      Methods in org.neo4j.csv.reader that return Magic 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Magic Magic.define​(String description, Charset impliesEncoding, int... bytesAsIntsForConvenience)
      Defines a magic signature which can later be detected in of(Path) and of(byte[]).
      static Magic Magic.of​(byte[] bytes)
      Matches the magic bytes with all defined and returns a match or NONE.
      static Magic Magic.of​(Path file)
      Extracts and matches the magic of the header in the given file.
